scenes.background: Monica and Bob are discussing the celebration. Monica seems a bit frustrated.
scenes.description: I just feel a formal dinner might be too uptight for our team.

options.text: Formal dinners can still be relaxed and enjoyable if we plan them right.
options.analysis: You acknowledged the concern but offered a positive perspective, showing good perception and social skills, though empathy and self-regulation were moderate.

options.text: Let's see if we can find a balance between formal and casual.
options.analysis: You showed empathy and self-regulation by seeking a compromise, but social skill and perception were moderate.

options.text: We could skip the formal dinner if it makes people uncomfortable.
options.analysis: You suggested a change to avoid discomfort, showing good empathy and motivation, though social skill and perception were lower.
